item.title: How to exclude subversion hidden directories (.svn) using Ant
item.description: Many Java developers already know that Ant is a great build tool. Besides a build tool you also need a good version control system to manage the various versions of your code. For this purpose I often use Subversion. Now, there might be time when you need to exclude the Subversion hidden directories from, for example, a backup Ant target you built.
